# Ruby Style Guide

## Strings
- Always use double-quotes for strings
- Use string interpolation instead of concatenation

## Formatting
- 80 character line limit
- Use trailing commas on multiline structures
- Method chaining uses leading dots on continuation lines

## Collections
- Prefer `each` over `for`
- Use `map` instead of `collect`
- Prefer `&:method` syntax for simple blocks
